N

NetManager - Class in Unnamed Package
Network Manager class that manages a collection of NetPairs, offering capabilities like adding and removing connections as well as disconnecting or searching for a specific connection
NetManager() - Constructor for class NetManager
No-args constructor that initializes the list and read/write locks to ensure that the list is not being written to at the wrong times
NetPair - Class in Unnamed Package
Pair of NetSockets that represents a connection to another node
NetPair(NetSocket, NetSocket) - Constructor for class NetPair
Sole constructor
NetSocket - Class in Unnamed Package
Class that handles a single connection as a listener or a broadcaster to a node
NetSocket(String, int) - Constructor for class NetSocket

NetSocket(Socket) - Constructor for class NetSocket
